descripcion:
This formulation is produced specially for the nutritional needs of bermudagrass. A superb fertilizer for greens, tees, and fairways. The nutrition package in this formula helps bermudagrass tolerate heavy traffic, frequent mowing, and rapid decomposition of thatch.

DERIVED FROM: Potassium Nitrate, Urea, Ammonium Phosphate, Iron EDDHA, Iron EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367.

POTENTIAL ACIDITY: 675 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.

SOLUBILITY (max.): 2 lbs per gallon in cold water. Hot water and agitation improve solubility.
informacionTecnica:
Total Nitrogen (N) 25%
2.5% Ammoniacal Nitrogen
6.0% Nitrate Nitrogen
16.5% Urea Nitrogen
Available Phosphate (P2O5) 5%
Soluble Potash (K2O) 20%
Sulphur (S) 1.7%
Boron (B) 0.01%
Copper (Cu) 0.01%
0.01% Chelated Copper (Cu)
Iron (Fe) 0.20%
0.20% Chelated Iron (Fe)
Manganese (Mn) 0.06%
0.06% Chelated Manganese
Molybdenum (Mo) 0.01%
Zinc (Zn) 0.02%
0.02% Chelated Zinc
